DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Diagnostic Breast Biopsy Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to the removal and pathologic examination of specimens, in the form of small pieces of tissue from the breast(s), for diagnostic purposes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Diagnostic Breast Biopsy Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the removal and pathologic examination of specimens, in the form of small pieces of tissue from the breast(s), for diagnostic purposes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of (e.g., a disease).:One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
